They are elite, marine hunters with an extremely diverse diet including other apex predators like the great white shark. Killer whales pursue their prey like a pack of wolves and have multiple killing techniques. .

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: We start on the tiny island of Batan, meeting a unique viper and a ubiquitous but also giant, land crab. Luzon is the main island of the Philippines. We drop in to Mindoro to see the most endangered large mammal in the Philippines, the tamaraw.

programme.title: Snakes In The City
programme.desc: It‚Äôs monsoon season in the South Indian city of Mysore and Simon and Sioux team up with local snake catcher, Snake Shyam, to rescue a deadly Russell‚Äôs viper stuck in netting, a snake in a salon, a grumpy keelback hiding underwater, a huge rat snake in a factory and one of the world‚Äôs most venomous snakes, the common krait, hiding in a shoe!.

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: The Christmas Island red crab is a land bound crab that still has strong ties to the ocean, the only place where they can give birth to their young.

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: When you've got it all, why would you give it all up? We expect animals to take the path of least resistance -- choosing the easiest and surest ways to get food, safety and comfort. But animals aren't always so predictable.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pol‚Äôs are preparing for sheep to give birth, which means figuring out how to catch and shear their four Merino ewes ‚Äì no small task as this is new territory for everyone except Dr. Pol. Then, while helping his dad on a farm call, Charles has a terrifying accident. The whole family rallies together to care for Charles and take care of the farm.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: It‚Äôs been a year of farming for the Pol family. Even with Charles recovering from his injury, the farm‚Äôs showing no signs of slowing down! Beth takes the next step with her bees to grow the colony and harvest honey. Charles and Ben come up with a final fix for the sheep hut‚Äôs drainage problem. The whole family comes together to plant the garden and celebrate a successful year on the farm.

programme.title: Wild Arabia
programme.desc: Discover Saudi Arabia‚Äôs rugged landscapes where wildlife ingeniously adapts to extreme conditions. Amid sun-scorched terrain, creatures endure searing sun, thin air, and toxic gases. Explore bone caves, and marvel at rock art depicting local fauna‚Äîdeadly scorpions, raucous baboons, charming chameleons, and endangered leopards. Their resilience mirrors the harsh beauty of Saudi Arabia‚Äôs environment.

programme.title: Freaks And Creeps
programme.desc: Lucy Cooke is on a one-woman mission to show why the ugly, weird and overlooked animals of the world can be cute, cuddly and deserving of attention. Join her as she heads off to the rainforests of Borneo. Borneo is its own very unique crucible of weirdness - with countless strange creatures that can only be found there. Lucy's goal is get up close with the giant-nosed proboscis monkey to figure out why this creature looks so strange.

programme.title: Killer Whale Chronicles
programme.desc: Orcas are the rulers of the seas. These majestic marine mammals have captured the hearts of people with their intelligence and complex family structures. However, since killer whales started attacking boats near Gibraltar, many are asking: Are they threatening us or just playing? The central revelation is that orcas, with specialized 'cultures,' perfectly exploit the richness of the seas.

programme.title: Wild Arabia
programme.desc: Discover Saudi Arabia‚Äôs rugged landscapes where wildlife ingeniously adapts to extreme conditions. Amid sun-scorched terrain, creatures endure searing sun, thin air, and toxic gases. Explore bone caves, and marvel at rock art depicting local fauna‚Äîdeadly scorpions, raucous baboons, charming chameleons, and endangered leopards. Their resilience mirrors the harsh beauty of Saudi Arabia‚Äôs environment.

programme.title: Freaks And Creeps
programme.desc: Lucy Cooke is on a one-woman mission to show why the ugly, weird and overlooked animals of the world can be cute, cuddly and deserving of attention. Join her as she heads off to the rainforests of Borneo. Borneo is its own very unique crucible of weirdness - with countless strange creatures that can only be found there. Lucy's goal is get up close with the giant-nosed proboscis monkey to figure out why this creature looks so strange.

programme.title: Ocean's Weirdest
programme.desc: Life can be a wild ride and nature can be a cruel mistress. When it‚Äôs adapt or die weird has the edge. Embrace the strange in Mutant Misadventures. .

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: The clinic is slammed with summertime cases as the vets battle to save a badly injured cat, a farm dog with a puncture wound, and a wobbling mini horse struggling to walk. The team is seeing double as pairs of ferrets and chickens come through the door. Doc and Dianes new puppy brings chaos and cuteness to the clinic.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: The Fair is in full swing! Getting to this day took months of hard work from vets and kids to get the Fair animals in tip top shape. Even after the Fair opens, the vets are on call to treat any emergency that pops up. Dr. Pol treats a goat with a torn ear as Dr. Lisa examines a limping cow. At the clinic, Dr. Nicole is tireless in her effort to save the life of a beloved dog.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol: Compilation
programme.desc: Everyone at the clinic loves to lend a helping hand, even the patients and their owners. The team rushes to treat a dog with bloody paws, a pair of goats with a contagious skin condition, and visit a therapy farm for emotional support horses. The office is packed with support animals in need of care and the Pol vets will stop at nothing to get these hard-working pets on the road to recovery.

programme.title: The Living Edens
programme.desc: There is a 1,200-mile strip of land on the southwestern coast of Africa where the searing Namib Desert meets the frigid Atlantic Ocean. Here, the basic elements of the earth exist in paradoxical extremes. The Namib, an extremely arid desert, is often cloaked in fog created by the cold, nutrient-rich Benguela Current.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Side: Dynasties
programme.desc: Botswana is home to exotic and diverse creatures, but all share one single purpose: keep the bloodline alive. From finding a mate, to raising the next generation, Africa's most beloved animals fight for survival every day..

programme.title: Born In Africa
programme.desc: All newborns must immediately assimilate two fundamental notions: recognizing their mother as individuals of their own species, and learn to master the body they are discovering. .

programme.title: Born In Africa
programme.desc: Each species follows a different rhythm of growth, and this applies to the learning process. As the days go by, we will witness each of our characters' progress and missteps. .

programme.title: Born In Africa
programme.desc: Our little fluff balls now know their place within the family. Now, those 'teens' are armed to face the new dangers that lie in wait for them in the savanna. .

programme.title: Killer Whale Chronicles
programme.desc: A central theme of this episode is the remarkable learning behavior of orcas, passed on from generation to generation. As marine biologist and wildlife filmmaker Florian Graner explores the mysteries of orcas, viewers immerse themselves in the different cultures of the orca populations in the Salish Sea.

programme.title: Wonders Of The Ocean
programme.desc: Life in the ocean is a constant battle to eat but not get eaten, to find a mate, to pass on your genes to the next generation..to survive..

programme.title: Ocean's Weirdest
programme.desc: Dive deep into the most misguided attempts to find love that the ocean‚Äôs animals have to offer.
